00024 extern int yydebug;

00026 char optflag = 0;
00027 code_list_t *cl = NULL;

00029 int main (int argc, char *argv[])
00030 {
00031     FILE *oofp = NULL, 
00032          *uoofp = NULL;
00033     char result = 0, 
00034          farg = 0;
00035 
00036     #ifndef FILEOPTIM
00037        char **ca = NULL;
00038     #endif
00039 
00040     unlink ("bg.bat");
00041     unlink ("bgo.bat");
00042     unlink (TMPFNAM);
00043 
00044     farg = getopts (argc, argv);
00045     if (farg != 0)
00046         yyin = fopen (argv [farg], "rt");
00047     else
00048         yyin = stdin;
00049 
00050     if (yyin == NULL)
00051     {
00052        perror ("cannot open input file");
00053        return 1;
00054     }
00055 
00056     stack_init ();
00057 
00058 #ifdef YYDEBUG
00059     yydebug = 1;
00060 #endif
00061 
00062     if (yyparse () == 0)
00063     {
00064         char banner[BUFSIZ];
00065         char opts[BUFSIZ];
00066         code_list_t *mainjmp = new_code_node ();
00067         char filename[BUFSIZ];
00068         int i;
00069 
00070         strcpy (filename, (farg == 0 ? "stdin":argv[farg]));
00071 
00072         for (i = 0; i < num_sr; i++)
00073             cl = code_join (2, srcode [i], cl);
00074 
00075         add_string (mainjmp, "@goto main\n");
00076         cl = code_join (2, mainjmp, cl);
00077 
00078         make_opts(opts);
00079         make_banner(argv[0], 
00080                     filename,
00081                     opts,
00082                     banner);
00083         write_code(banner, uoofp);
00084         if (optflag)
00085             write_optim_code(banner, ca, oofp);
00086    }
00087    else
00088    {
00089       result = 1;
00090    }
00091 
00092    if (yyin != NULL && yyin != stdin)
00093       fclose (yyin);
00094 
00095    return result;
00096 }
00097 
00098 char getopts (int argc, char *argv[])
00099 {
00100    char i;
00101    char fname = 0;
00102 
00103    for (i = 0; i < argc; i++)
00104    {
00105       if (argv [i][0] == '-')
00106          set_flag(argv[i]);
00107       else if (fname == 0)
00108          fname = i;
00109    }
00110 
00111    return fname;
00112 }
00113 
00114 /*
00115     caller is sending us a string from the cmd line
00116     that is known to be an option.
00117     we find out what the option is and set flags
00118     or issue error messages accordingly.
00119 */
00120 void set_flag(char *argv)
00121 {
00122     switch (argv [1])
00123     {
00124     case 'o':   
00125     {
00126         int j;
00127 
00128         optflag = 1;
00129         for (j = 2; argv [j] != 0; j++)
00130         {
00131             switch (argv [j])
00132             {
00133             case 'r': 
00134                 remove_rems = 1;
00135                 break;
00136             case 'b': 
00137                 remove_blanks = 1;
00138                 break;
00139             default: 
00140                 fprintf (stderr, 
00141                          "unknown option -%c\n",\
00142                          argv [j]);
00143                 break;
00144             }
00145         }
00146         break;
00147     }
00148     case 'h':   
00149         fprintf (stderr, "usage: %s [-o[r|b]] filename\n", argv[0]);
00150         exit (3);
00151     default: 
00152         fprintf (stderr, "unknown option -%c\n", argv [1]);
00153     break;
00154     }
00155 }
00156 
00157 void make_opts(char opts[BUFSIZ])
00158 {
00159     opts[0] = 0;
00160     if (optflag)
00161         strcpy(opts, "-o");
00162     if (remove_rems)
00163         strcat(opts, "r");
00164     if (remove_blanks)
00165         strcat(opts, "b");
00166 }
00167 
00168 void make_banner(char *progname, char *fname, char *opts, char banner[BUFSIZ])
00169 {
00170     time_t timeNow;
00171     char szTime[BUFSIZ];
00172     struct tm *localTime = NULL;
00173 
00174     time(&timeNow);
00175     localTime = localtime(&timeNow);
00176     sprintf (szTime, 
00177              "%d-%d-%d %02d:%02d:%02d", 
00178              localTime->tm_year + 1900,
00179              localTime->tm_mon,
00180              localTime->tm_mday+1, /* yes, really. days start at 1, 
00181                                       months start at 0 */
00182              localTime->tm_hour,
00183              localTime->tm_min,
00184              localTime->tm_sec);
00185 
00186     banner[0] = 0;
00187     sprintf(banner,
00188           "@echo off\n"
00189           "rem this file has been generated by batchgen and may be overwritten\n"
00190           "rem command line: %s %s %s\n"
00191           "rem date %s\n\n",
00192           progname,
00193           opts,
00194           fname,
00195           szTime);
00196 }

00198 int write_code(char *banner, FILE *uoofp)
00199 {
00200     uoofp = fopen ("bg.bat", "wt");
00201     if (uoofp == NULL)
00202     {
00203         fprintf (stderr, "unable to open unopt out file\n");
00204         return 1;
00205     }
00206 
00207     fprintf(uoofp, "%s", banner);
00208     emit (cl, uoofp);
00209     fclose (uoofp);
00210 
00211     return 0;
00212 }
00213 
00214 int write_optim_code(char *banner, char **ca, FILE *oofp)
00215 {
00216     #ifdef FILEOPTIM
00217     oofp = fopen ("bgo.bat", "wt");
00218     if (oofp == NULL)
00219     {
00220         fprintf (stderr, "unable to open opt out file\n");
00221         return 1;
00222     }
00223     emit (cl, oofp);
00224     if (fclose (oofp) != 0)
00225         perror ("oofp");
00226 
00227     if (F_optimize () != 0)
00228     {
00229         fprintf (stderr, "optimize failed\n");
00230         if (system ("copy bco.bat bco.tmp > nul") != 0)
00231             perror ("opt fail");
00232         if (system ("echo rem BAD FILE > bco.bat") != 0)
00233             perror ("opt fail");
00234         if (system ("echo goto "DUD_FILE_LABEL" >> bco.bat") != 0)
00235             perror ("opt fail");
00236         if (system ("type bco.tmp >> bco.bat") != 0)
00237             perror ("opt fail");
00238         if (system ("echo:"DUD_FILE_LABEL">>bco.bat") != 0)
00239             perror ("opt fail");
00240     }
00241     #else
00242     oofp = fopen ("bgo.bat", "wt");
00243     if (oofp == NULL)
00244     {
00245         fprintf (stderr, "unable to open opt out file\n");
00246         return 1;
00247     }
00248 
00249     ca = copy_lines (cl);  
00250     if (optimize (ca) == 0)
00251     {
00252         fprintf(oofp, "%s", banner);
00253         print_ca (ca, oofp);
00254     }
00255     else
00256     {
00257         fprintf (stderr, "optimize failed\n");
00258         fprintf (oofp, "rem BAD FILE\ngoto "DUD_FILE_LABEL"\n");
00259         print_ca (ca, oofp);
00260         fprintf (oofp, ":"DUD_FILE_LABEL"\n");
00261     }
00262     fclose (oofp);
00263     #endif
00264 
00265     return 0;
00266 }
